item.title: Philosophy for Software Developers
item.description: Bertrand Russell has been an inspiring influence on me since my university years. This post is inspired by his thoughts on why Philosophy is useful.

item.title: Scrum and Empiricism
item.description: Scrum demonstrates a scientific orientation towards project management. It’s foundations in empiricism make it a scientific enterprise.
